title: Definition of an Even Function
text: A function is called an even function if for every input $$x$$, $$f(x)=f(-x)$$.
speech: A function is called an even function if for every input  x ,  f of x, is equal to, f of negative x .

title: Definition of an Odd Function
text: A function is called an odd function if for every input $$x$$, $$f(x)=-f(-x)$$.
speech: A function is called an odd function if for every input  x ,  f of x, is equal to, negative f of negative x .
pacedSpeech: A function is called an odd function if for every input   x
,   f of x, is equal to, negative f of negative x

title: How to Find $$f(-x)$$
text: Find $$f(-x)$$ by subsituting $$-x$$ in wherever $$x$$ appears in the original equation. $${\left(-x\right)}^n=x^n$$ when $$n$$ is an even, and $${\left(-x\right)}^n=-\left(x^n\right)$$ when $$n$$ is odd.

title: How to Find $$-f(-x)$$
text: Find $$-f(-x)$$ by multiplying each term of $$f(-x)$$ by $$-1$$.
